Leigh Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
leigh-contest

Test Piece Contest
Smiles and Tears
Assembly Rooms, Leigh This contest was confined to Bands within the Leigh District. Mr. Alldred was the Bandmaster of the Atherton Rifle Volunteer Band. The test piece was the Waltz "Smiles and Tears" (Round) 4 bands competed
Oct. 18, 2012, 8:14 a.m. Jan. 20, 2020, 11:14 p.m.
